name: atlassian-data-center
title: Atlassian Data Center
description: Search and manage Confluence and Jira Data Center with advanced filters and query syntax support
author: tofrankie

preferences.name: confluenceBaseUrl
preferences.title: Confluence Base URL
preferences.description: Your Confluence Data Center instance URL (e.g., https://wiki.yourcompany.com)

preferences.name: confluencePersonalAccessToken
preferences.title: Confluence Personal Access Token
preferences.description: Your Confluence Personal Access Token for API authentication. Create it from: Profile → Personal Access Tokens → Create token
preferences.placeholder: Enter your Confluence Personal Access Token

preferences.name: jiraBaseUrl
preferences.title: Jira Base URL
preferences.description: Your Jira Data Center instance URL (e.g., https://jira.yourcompany.com)

preferences.name: jiraPersonalAccessToken
preferences.title: Jira Personal Access Token
preferences.description: Your Jira Personal Access Token for API authentication. Create it from: Profile → Personal Access Tokens → Create token
preferences.placeholder: Enter your Jira Personal Access Token

preferences.name: searchPageSize
preferences.title: Search Results Per Page
preferences.description: Number of search results to display per page (default: 20). Increase if pagination doesn't work properly.

preferences.name: replaceCurrentUserInQuery
preferences.title: Replace currentUser in Queries
preferences.description: When copying CQL/JQL queries, replace currentUser() with actual username for better portability
preferences.label: Replace currentUser with username

preferences.name: debugEnable
preferences.title: Debug Enable
preferences.description: Enable debug mode to write API responses to files for troubleshooting
preferences.label: Enable debug mode

commands.name: confluence-search-content
commands.title: Search Content
commands.subtitle: Confluence Data Center
commands.description: Search Confluence content with advanced filters and CQL syntax support

commands.name: confluence-search-space
commands.title: Search Space
commands.subtitle: Confluence Data Center
commands.description: Search Confluence spaces with type filters

commands.name: jira-search-issue
commands.title: Search Issue
commands.subtitle: Jira Data Center
commands.description: Search Jira issues with advanced filters and JQL syntax support

commands.name: jira-manage-field
commands.title: Manage Field
